document.docTitle: Homoneura (Homoneura) notostigma Shi & Yang, 2014, sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: Supplements to species groups of the subgenus Homoneura in China (Diptera: Lauxaniidae: Homoneura), with descriptions of twenty new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Supplements to species groups of the subgenus Homoneura in China (Diptera: Lauxaniidae: Homoneura), with descriptions of twenty new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
88 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) notostigma (Kertész, 1913 )
. Oriental: China (Hainan, Taiwan ), Thailand .

89 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) ornatifrons (Kertész, 1913 )
. Oriental: China ( Taiwan ), Japan (Ryukyu), Vietnam . (
Figs. 179–183
).

90 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) picta (Meijere, 1904 )
. Palaearctic: Moscow; Oriental: China (Guangxi, Guizhou, Hainan, Taiwan , Zhejiang), India , Indonesia , Malaysia , Nepal , Thailand , Vietnam .

91 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) procerula Gao & Yang, 2005
. Oriental: China (Guizhou).

92 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) trypetoptera (Hendel, 1908 )
. Oriental: China (Guizhou, Hainan, Taiwan ), India , Indonesia , Laos , Malaysia , Nepal , Philippines , Sri Lanka , Thailand , Vietnam . (
Figs. 315–318
).

93 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) brevicornis (Kertész, 1915 )
. Oriental: China (Heilongjiang, Hainan, Taiwan ), Indonesia , Phillippines, Japan (Ryukyus), Australian/Oceanian: New Guinea , Solomon Islands .

94 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) cangshanensis Li & Yang, 2014
. Oriental: China (Yunnan).

95 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) crispa Li & Yang, 2014
. Oriental: China (Yunnan).

96 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) haejuana Sasakawa & Kozánek, 1995
. Palaearctic: China ( Tianjin ), North Korea .

97 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) levis (Wiedemann, 1830 )
. Oriental: China ( Macao ). (
Fig. 13
)

98 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) litorea Shi, Gaimari & Yang, 2012
. Oriental: China (Hainan).

99 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) longinotata Shi & Yang, 2009
. Oriental: China (Hainan).

100 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) quinquenotata (Meijere, 1915 )
. Oriental: China (Fujian, Hainan, Taiwan ), Indonesia , Laos , Malaysia , Vietnam . (
Figs. 205–216
).

101 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) semiannulata Li & Yang, 2014
. Oriental: China (Yunnan).

102 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) stackelbergiana Papp, 1984
. Palaearctic: China (Beijing), North Korea , Russia .

103 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) suturalis Yang, Zhu & Hu, 2003
. Oriental: China (Fujian).

104 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) trisurstylata Li & Yang, 2014
. Oriental: China (Yunnan).

105 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) interrupta Sasakawa, 2001
. Oriental: China (Hainan), Vietnam . (
Figs. 10
,
138– 142
).

106 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) quinquevittata (Meijere, 1910 )
. Oriental: China (Fujian, Guizhou, Hainan, Taiwan , Yunnan), India , Indonesia , Japan (Ryukyu), Laos , Malaysia , Nepal , Philippines , Thailand . (
Figs. 217–223
).

107 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) strigata (Meijere, 1910 )
. Oriental: China (Guangxi, Hainan), Indonesia , Malaysia , Laos , Vietnam . (
Figs. 272–283
).

108 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) conspicua Sasakawa, 2001
. Oriental: China (Hainan), Vietnam . ( Figs. 2 ,
76– 80
).

109 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) degenerata
sp. nov.
Oriental: China (Hainan). ( Figs. 4 ,
97– 101
).

110 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) longiplumaria Yang, Hu & Zhu, 2002
. Oriental: China (Hainan).

111 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) sauteri Malloch, 1927
. Oriental: China (Hainan, Taiwan ), Laos , Malaysia , Sri Lanka , Vietnam . (
Figs. 224–234
).

112 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) septentrionalis (Loew, 1847 )
. Palaearctic: China (Harbin), Mongolia , Russia . (
Figs. 235–243
).

113 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) simplicissima (Meijere, 1910 )
. Oriental: China ( Taiwan ), Indonesia , Malaysia , Philippines . (
Figs. 260–271
).

114 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) aulatheca Sasakawa & Ikeuchi, 1985
. Palaearctic: Japan , North Korea ; Oriental: China ( Taiwan ).

115 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) concava Sasakawa, 2002
. Oriental: China ( Taiwan ). (
Figs. 71–75
).

116 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) didyma Yang, Zhu & Hu, 2003
. Oriental: China (Fujian).

117 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) falcata
sp. nov.
Oriental: China (Hainan). (
Figs. 6
,
107– 111
).

118 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) fengyangshanica
sp. nov.
Oriental: China (Zhejiang). (
Figs. 7
,
112– 116
).

119 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) hongmaoensis
sp. nov.
Oriental: China (Hainan). (
Figs. 9
,
133– 137
).

120 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) latifrons Malloch, 1927
. Oriental: China ( Taiwan ), Japan (Kyushu, Ryukyus). (
Figs. 152–157
).

121 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) longicornis Sasakawa, 2002
. Oriental: China ( Taiwan ).

122 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) singularis Yang, Hu & Zhu, 2002
. Oriental: China (Hainan).

123 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) subvittata Malloch, 1927
. Oriental: China ( Taiwan ), Indonesia , Malaysia , Thailand . (
Figs. 289–299
).

124 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) tianlinensis Gao & Yang, 2004
. Oriental: China (Guangxi).

125 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) zhejiangensis
sp. nov.
Oriental: China (Zhejiang). (
Figs. 24
,
332– 336
).

126 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) vittigera Sasakawa, 2001
. Oriental: China (Hainan, Yunnan), Vietnam .

127 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) chishuiensis Gao & Yang, 2006
. Oriental: China (Guizhou, Hainan, Yunnan).

128 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) shunxica
sp. nov.
Oriental: China (Zhejiang). (
Figs. 18
,
244– 248
).

129 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) substigmata Yang, Zhu & Hu, 1999
. Oriental: China (Henan).

130 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) lata Yang, Hu & Zhu, 2001
. Oriental: China (Zhejiang).

131 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) pictipennis Czerny, 1932
. Palaearctic: China (Harbin), Russia . (
Figs. 190–194
).

132 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) polyacantha Yang, Zhu & Hu, 1999
. Oriental: China (Henan).

133 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) tibetensis Gao & Yang, 2003
. Palaearctic: China (Tibet).

134 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) variinervis (Kertész, 1915 )
. Palaearctic: Japan (Honshu). Oriental: China ( Taiwan ), Japan (Ryukyu), Thailand .

135 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) bicuspidata
sp. nov.
Oriental: China (Hainan). ( Figs. 1 ,
34– 38
).

136 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) noticomata
sp. nov.
Oriental: China (Hainan). (
Figs. 15
,
163– 167
).

137 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) trispina Malloch, 1927
. Oriental: China (Hainan), Indonesia , Malaysia , Singapore .

138 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) diversa (Kertész, 1913 )
. Oriental: China (Fujian, Taiwan ), Philippines .

139 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) jianlingensis
sp. nov.
Oriental: China (Hainan). (
Figs. 11
,
143– 146
).

140 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) pallidula Malloch, 1927
. Oriental: China ( Taiwan ). (
Figs. 184–189
).

141 .
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) unguiculata (Kertész, 1913 )
. Palaearctic: Japan (Honshu, Kyushu, Shikoku), North Korea ; Oriental: China (Fujian, Guangdong, Hainan, Taiwan ), Indonesia , Japan (Ryukyu), Malaysia , Sri Lanka , Vietnam ; Australian/Oceanian: USA (Hawaii), Micronesia . (
Figs. 319–322
).
